descriptionHtml:
[center][size=20]BRIGHT WATERS FOAMS AT NIGHT IS A COMMON ISSUE OF ENB\'S IF YOU FOUND A FIX KINDLY GIVE US THE LINK AT THE COMMENT SECTION[/size][/center]
[center][b][size=4]Good Quality & FPS: Guaranteed!
My Specs:
i5-2500k 3.30GHz
Gtx 260 galaxy
4gb RAM
HDD
[/size][/b][/center]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/o0dz5d.jpg[/img]
[center][b][i]\"When you play it you\'ll realize \"this is what skyrim should have look like\"[/i][/b][/center]

[center][b]NOTE: IMPORTANT DON\'T CHANGE THE d3d9.dll MY SETTINGS ARE OPTIMIZED WITH THAT DLL![/b][/center]

[center][b]\"Please give a feedback and endorse me so together we can improve this mod =)\"[/b][/center]

[center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/aad9if.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]~My ENB is optimized with these mods. Download for full quality~[/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/521]Sparkle Lush Environment Pack
[DOWNLOAD THE 25 CONTRAST IT FITS WELL WITH MY ENB][/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1892]Sparkle Lush Cities Pack
[DOWNLOAD THE 25 CONTRAST IT FITS WELL WITH MY ENB][/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13531]Ultra Realistic World Lightning[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][LOAD ORDER: URWL MUST BE AT THE VERY BOTTOM!TO AVOID STRANGE LIGHTNING EFFECTS][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/]Realistic Lightning Overhaul[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13531]Spell of Luminus[OPTIONAL FILE!][/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][i]The spell of luminus gives you the option to adjust the night brightness that suites your taste[/i][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1197]HD Reflection[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enchanced LIghts and FX[/url][/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]W.A.T.E.R[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates Of Tamriel[/url][/b][/center] 

[center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2hn3xw9.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22407]Avatar of Balthazar[/url][/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17536]Power Of The Gods[/url][/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12801]Optimized Textures[/url][/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]SMIM[/url][/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11356]Mikes Foxx Darker Nights[/url][/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141]Flora Overhaul[/url][/b][/center]  
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607]2K Textures[/url][/b][/center] 

[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2rrt5op.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]just extract the files to your skyrim folder where skyrim launcher is located
shift+F12 in game to disable and enable ENB
Use scroll lock to disable and enable SweetFX [/center]

[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j348w6.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b]Hialgo is the program for you it will also help you to greatly improve your FPS. Guaranteed!![/b][/center] 
[center][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15123]HiAlgoBoost FPS Performance[/url][/b][/center] 





[center][b][i]This ENB is based from A realistic hope and Lydia\'s Customized ENB 
reason why i made this because i don\'t want to play the game while having 10-25 fps it kinda feels slow so i made my customized version and using sharpshooters and lydias enb for guideline and it turned out in good results maintaining the same quality as any good enb out there while having a good ol\' 60fps in my rig but as you can see screen shots were not that good because i\'m not using 2k textures it simply kills my computer.[/i][/b][/center]
author: Ravenarc
